price: Da, ovo je Dan strašnog suda u koji vi niste vjerovali!
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
